extension.summary: Allows to use XBMC as a frontend to mame
extension.description:
First release : - Supports listing by Year, Bios, Manufacturer, Game Name, Games with hard drive. - Supports romset filtering on certain criteria. - Supports Video and Dipswitch settings from XBMC. - Includes a basic name search engine.
Please send comments and feature requests to xbmame@otaku-realm.net
